LanguageData.Electric_fence.label: Electric Fence
LanguageData.Electric_fence.description: An electric fence is a barrier that uses electric shocks to deter animals from crossing a boundary. The voltage of the shock may have effects ranging from discomfort to death.
LanguageData.Electric_fence_door.label: Electric Fence Gate
LanguageData.Electric_fence_door.description: Electric Fence gate which is passable without any danger for the home crew. But still damages any hostile trying to pass through.
LanguageData.electricPanel.label: Shock floor panel
LanguageData.electricPanel.description: Electric floor panel that is designed to stun and shock hostiles
LanguageData.Plasma_fence.label: Plasma Fence
LanguageData.Plasma_fence.description: Plasma fence is an advanced version of electric fence that require high grade materials and careful assembly. Any hostile who tries to pass through is in danger of being burned by electric plasma arc.
LanguageData.Plasma_fence_door.label: Plasma Fence Gate
LanguageData.Plasma_fence_door.description: Plasma Fence gate which is passable without any danger for the home crew. But still damages any hostile trying to pass through.
